from os import path as osp

PATH_PREFIX = '/kaggle/input/nvidia-tensorrt-install'

PATH_NVIDIA = 'nvidia'

PATH_SOURCE = osp.join(PATH_PREFIX if osp.exists(PATH_PREFIX) else '', PATH_NVIDIA)

PATH_SOURCE
source.b78a0392:
# Nvidia TensorRT Install

This notebook helps to install Nvidia TensorRT binaries and Python API to/from local files.

1. Download Python wheel files to local `nvidia` directory

2. Attach this notebook output as input to any notebook where TensorRT installation is required

3. Install TensorRT from `/kaggle/input/nvidia-tensorrt-install` directory

    A. (Optionally) Install TensorRT in this notebook

    B. (Optionally) Import TensorRT in this notebook to check installation
